name: Gigamart POS Batch
description: Batch ingestion of POS transactions from GCS to BigQuery raw layer (giga_raw.raw_pos_transactions).

parameters.name: input_pattern
parameters.label: Input GCS pattern
parameters.helpText: GCS file pattern for POS transactions (e.g. gs://<bucket>/pos/*.json)

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for raw POS transactions (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_pos_transactions)

parameters.name: dead_letter_table
parameters.label: Dead-letter table
parameters.helpText: Optional BigQuery table for failed POS records (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_pos_transactions_dlq). If not set, errors are only logged.
